recipesJson.name: It's Over 4000!!
recipesJson.author: Darthy
recipesJson.description: all of the flavors i have that are in over 4000 recipes on here, using their at the time (12/30/17) average amounts. as a shake and vape it tastes like strawberries and cream. after a 2 week steep it tastes more like a strawberry milk. to me its quite similar to Vapor in a Bottle's Strawberry Milk. after a month's steep its still very good.
